mapper.select: SELECT s.lot_no, i.company_code, i.item_code, i.item_category, i.item_stock_unit, i.item_specification, i.item_name, i.item_category, w.warehouse_code, w.warehouse_name, wd.area_code FROM pp_perform s INNER JOIN ma_item i ON s.item_code = i.item_code INNER JOIN wh w ON i.company_code = w.company_code INNER JOIN wh_detail wd ON w.warehouse_code = wd.warehouse_code WHERE i.company_code = #{company_code}

SELECT s.lot_no, i.company_code, i.item_code, i.item_category, i.item_stock_unit, i.item_specification, i.item_name, i.item_category, w.warehouse_code, w.warehouse_name, wd.area_code FROM pp_perform s INNER JOIN ma_item i ON s.item_code = i.item_code INNER JOIN wh w ON i.company_code = w.company_code INNER JOIN wh_detail wd ON w.warehouse_code = wd.warehouse_code WHERE COALESCE(w.warehouse_code, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stock.warehouse_code}, '%') AND COALESCE(w.warehouse_name, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stock.warehouse_name}, '%') AND COALESCE(s.lot_no, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stock.lot_no}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_category, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stock.item_category}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_code, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stock.item_code}, '%') AND COALESCE(i.item_name, '') LIKE CONCAT('%', #{stock.item_name}, '%') AND i.company_code = #{company_code}
